body.p: This document defines the data requirements for using the HL7 Clinical Document Architecture for reporting the experience of non-human subjects within a trial. It has been decisively influenced by the CDISC SEND Implementation Guide, and draws some descriptive material directly from that document. Code sets defined by CDISC - and managed within the NCI Enterprise vocabulary Services (EVS) will be used whenever possible.
This is a work authored by employees of the U.S. Government. Therefore, copyright may not be established in the United States, 17 U.S.C. ยง 105.
